dialogue.text: It was so sad to see you knocked out while I was [RIPPING] your [GIRLFRIEND'S] head off...
Look at you.\nSmall, [HELPLESS] and [PATHETIC]...\nCrying over death.
You are such a waste of space on this shitty planet, y'know that right?
Chin up you fucking burden.\nI'm going to give you a choice...
1. You give me your body so I can [G9$2VV?!JFD**&$].
2. You do your stupid singing shit, and freeze to death right after I eat HER head.
Which one will it be?
Y-you're dead.\nYOU'RE SO FUCKING DEAD!!!
YOU DESERVE TO EXPERIENCE YOUR\nHORRIFYING DEATH OVER AND OVER\nAGAIN!
YOU DESTROYED MY GIRLFRIEND, MY ONLY WILL TO LIVE!
I WILL MAKE SURE TO DESTROY EVERY SINGLE FUCKING ATOM OF YOUR UGLY BODY!!!!
Thats where you're wrong my friend...
She was ALREADY destroyed before I made her pretty... ALL the [PAIN] she had to go through the span of ELEVEN YEARS....
I searched her twisted mind....trying to find how that GIANT bruise on her back appeared...
WANNA KNOW WHAT I FOUND IN THAT SICK HEAD?!
I'D RATHER TALK TO HER WHEN I WAKE UP YOU INSANE PIECE OF FILTH!!
Too Bad.....
I saw a memory of her, wrapping a bandage around her arm. From that time her Dad stabbed her with a broken bottle.
I saw her look up ways to kill herself online....\nIn another memory, I watch her change her mind about dropping a hair dryer in the bath...
One more important memory, How she REALLY broke her arm. And not some BULLSHIT like:\n''I fell down the stairs''....
HOW CAN A FATHER THROW THEIR OWN KID OVER A BALCONY?!
I'm......I'm going to vommit.......
THE FUNNIEST PART IS THE FACT THAT SHE THINKS THAT EVERYTHING IS HER FAULT SOMEHOW!
YOU THINK THIS IS FUNNY, ASSHOLE?!?!
I FEEL SO ENRAGED BY WHAT SHE HAD TO GO THROUGH, AND ALL YOU CAN DO IS JUST LAUGH AT HER?!
IT'S GOING TO BE SO FUCKING FUNNY WHEN I MAKE YOU EAT HER.
YOU'RE STARTING WITH HER LEFT ARM...
I THINK YOU KNOW BY NOW THAT THE HEAD IS MY FAVORITE!!
